comment: Professor Green is an amazing teacher. She is willing to serve her students, meaning  she is extremely helpful. She is passionate about the Human Services field and has a plethora of knowledge to share.

Ms. Green is passionate about the HS field and genuinely cares about her students. She is always willing to help anyone and is a great teacher!! I was dreading taking interviewing skills beforehand but she made the class so much fun and created a class culture that was so welcoming and encouraging to everyone! YOU WILL LOVE HER! Take her!!
She is great!!! The best teacher  I've had. I was so scared to take this class because of role play, but she made it so comfortable. Take her!

Absolutely an amazing professor. She is so inspiring and you can tell that she loves teaching. Has so much experience in the field that it makes it a pleasure learning from her. She will have you do role-playing activities but don't worry, these even helped the most shy people develop more confidence as public speakers. Very knowledgeable.

Such a caring, passionate professor. Our class was like a family just because of the environment that Professor Green created. Just pay attention and do your assignments; almost a guaranteed A. Definitely one of my most favorite professors; she made a boring class well worth attending.
